animal.question: I say 'Meow' and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I am a good friend to humans. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🏠 I live in a kennel or house.

animal.question: I say 'Oink, oink' and love to roll in the mud. What am I?
I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?
I say 'Neigh' and you can ride on my back. What am I?
I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head.
🦁 I am a type of big cat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 📸 My stripes are unique to each individual.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots all over my body.

animal.question: I carry my home on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live a very long time.

animal.question: I have a trunk and big ears. I am the largest land animal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I use my trunk to drink water.
🌳 I live in Africa and Asia.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You might need an umbrella when I fall

weather.question: I am big and bright and give you heat. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You wear sunglasses when I am out
🌞 I am in the sky during the day

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ⛄ You can build a snowman with me
🧤 You need gloves when I am around

weather.question: I can be gentle or strong, and I make the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🪁 You can fly a kite when I'm around

weather.question: I am a white puffy shape that floats in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a sheep
☁️ I am made of water droplets

weather.question: I rumble and flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am a spark of electricity

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky after a rain shower. What am I?

hints.text: 🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through rain
✨ People say there is a pot of gold at my end

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I am smaller than snowballs.

hints.text: 🌨️ I bounce when I hit the ground
🥶 I can hurt if I hit you

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift things up into the air
🌀 I have an 'eye' in the center

weather.question: I am a hot and dry period with little or no rain for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 Plants and animals struggle when I happen
☀️ The ground cracks and dries up
